name: part_001
file: tmp_【#ときのそら５周年記念】想いをこめて届ける3D配信！ [TjGC7Jzc5ns]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora concludes her performance of 'HOT LIMIT'.
MC section where Tokino Sora greets the audience and talks about her 5th anniversary.
Ankimo DJ section with scratching sound effects.
MC section where Sora introduces her next performance and changes into her 'Dream!' outfit.

subtitles.original: はい！というわけで、5周年ライブみんな
subtitles.english: Yes! And so, everyone, for the 5th-anniversary live,

subtitles.original: 見に来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: thank you so much for coming to see it!

subtitles.original: 最初からいっぱい踊っちゃったよ。ありがとう。
subtitles.english: I've been dancing a lot right from the start. Thank you.

subtitles.original: お水を飲みながら、ちょっとお話を
subtitles.english: I'm going to talk a bit while

subtitles.original: しようかなと思います。お水はあっちだ。
subtitles.english: I drink some water. The water is over there.

subtitles.original: あ、お水だ、ありがとう。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Ah, water. Thank you. Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: なんであん肝なの？でも可愛いけど。
subtitles.english: Why is it Ankimo? It's cute though.

subtitles.original: 可愛いだろ？可愛いだろ？
subtitles.english: Cute, isn't it? Cute, isn't it?

subtitles.original: というわけで、あん肝の新衣装をね、ゲットしまして。
subtitles.english: So, Ankimo got a new outfit.

subtitles.original: ま、今日だけの新衣装なんですけど。
subtitles.english: Well, it's a new outfit just for today.

subtitles.original: 後ろにもあん肝がいるっていう。
subtitles.english: And there's another Ankimo in the back.

subtitles.original: あん肝もね、増えるものだからしょうがない。ね？
subtitles.english: Ankimo increases in number, so it can't be helped. Right?

subtitles.original: そして今回はですね、ときのそら5周年記念ということで、
subtitles.english: And this time, as it's Tokino Sora's 5th anniversary,

subtitles.original: こちらのハッシュタグでつぶやいていただけると、
subtitles.english: if you could use this hashtag to tweet about it,

subtitles.original: 嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: I'd be very happy!

subtitles.original: あ、可愛い。可愛いよね、可愛いよね、あん肝。
subtitles.english: Ah, cute. It's cute, isn't it? Ankimo is cute.

subtitles.original: ゲストにはね、0期生のみんなも後で登場するので、
subtitles.english: As for guests, all the members of Generation 0 will appear later,

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: so please look forward to it.

subtitles.original: 今回もね、まあ、知ってる人は知ってるかもしれないんですが、
subtitles.english: Also, as some of you might already know,

subtitles.original: 告知もあるので、よろしくお願いいたしますね。
subtitles.english: there are some announcements, so please stay tuned for those.

subtitles.original: というわけで、一曲目踊ったばかりなんですけど、
subtitles.english: So, even though I just finished dancing the first song,

subtitles.original: 早速歌っていこうと思います！いってきます！
subtitles.english: I'm going to start singing right away! Here I go!

subtitles.original: わぁーい！見てください、こちらですね。
subtitles.english: Yay! Look at this.

subtitles.original: 初めてのワンマンライブ『Dream!』でね、着ました
subtitles.english: This is the outfit that I wore for my

subtitles.original: 『Dream!』の衣装なんですけども。
subtitles.english: very first solo live, 'Dream!'.

subtitles.original: こちらで今回の曲、歌っていこうと思います。次の曲はですね、
subtitles.english: I'm going to sing the next songs in this outfit. The next songs are

subtitles.original: 私のカバーアルバムの中からカバーさせていただいた曲を
subtitles.english: from my cover album; I'd like you to listen to

subtitles.original: 2曲連続で聴いていただけたらと思います。それではいきましょう。
subtitles.english: two songs in a row that I've covered. Here we go.

subtitles.original: 続いての曲は...『嘘』。
subtitles.english: The next song is... 'Uso' (Lies).

subtitles.original: 嘘
subtitles.english: Lies

subtitles.original: 作詞：マオ 作曲：ゆうや
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Mao, Composition: Yuuya

subtitles.original: あの日見た空　茜色の空を
subtitles.english: The sky we saw that day, that madder-red sky...

subtitles.original: ねえ　君は覚えていますか
subtitles.english: Hey, do you remember it?

subtitles.original: 約束　初夏の風に消えた
subtitles.english: Our promise vanished in the early summer breeze,

subtitles.original: 二人寄り添って
subtitles.english: as we huddled together.

subtitles.original: 無理な笑顔の裏
subtitles.english: Behind a forced smile,

subtitles.original: 伸びた影をかくまう
subtitles.english: I hide the lengthening shadow.

subtitles.original: だから　気づかぬふり
subtitles.english: So, pretending not to notice,

subtitles.original: 再生を選んだ
subtitles.english: I chose to start over.

subtitles.original: テーブルの上の　震えない知らせ
subtitles.english: On top of the table, a notification that doesn't vibrate,

subtitles.original: 待ち続けて
subtitles.english: I keep waiting for it.

subtitles.original: 空白の夜も　来るはずのない朝も
subtitles.english: The empty nights, and the mornings that will never come—

subtitles.original: 全部わかってたんだ
subtitles.english: I knew it all.

subtitles.original: あの日見た空　茜色の空を
subtitles.english: The sky we saw that day, that madder-red sky...

subtitles.original: ねえ　君は忘れたのでしょう
subtitles.english: Hey, you've forgotten it, haven't you?

subtitles.original: 約束　初夏の風に消えた
subtitles.english: Our promise vanished in the early summer breeze;

subtitles.original: 二人戻れない
subtitles.english: we can't go back.

subtitles.original: 音も色も温度も
subtitles.english: Sounds, colors, and temperature...

subtitles.original: 半分になった　この部屋
subtitles.english: everything is halved in this room.

subtitles.original: 今日も散らかしては
subtitles.english: Tidying up today too...

subtitles.original: 揺れ　疲れ　眠る
subtitles.english: I sway, grow tired, and fall asleep.
